description:
* Based on the shounen manga series written by http://anidb.net/cr4250 [Yoshino Hiroyuki] and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr10188 [Satou Ken`etsu], serialised in http://anidb.net/cr32008 [Champion Red].
On the grounds of St. Mihailov Academy, a Japanese Eastern orthodox school, http://anidb.net/ch11293 [Oribe Mafuyu] and http://anidb.net/ch11294 [Yamanobe Tomo] encounter a mysterious, silver-haired, Russian boy named http://anidb.net/ch11297 [Sasha]. This pits them and the whole school in an all-out war between the Church itself and the so-called Adepts, a sect of individuals wielding powers linked to the elements of chemistry.
Source: Wikipedia
Note: Every TV broadcast was heavily censored. All scenes containing nudity and some panty shots were replaced with views of background art, even during action sequences; these cuts were common to a point they may confuse the viewer. An uncut "Director`s Cut" was streamed online, and the DVD/BD versions are also uncut.
